metadata.synopsis: One of the goblins is torturing a prisoner, either to find out where the grove is, or just because he wants to. The player can try to get rid of him - if Shadowheart is present, she gives some advice on how to do so. If Shadowheart is the avatar, she has unique options criticising the goblin's techniques.
metadata.how_to_trigger: from crashsite:goto 318.94, 40.81, -19.95walk towards liam on torture rackdialogue triggers automatically

32.speaker: Torturer Spike
32.text: He needs to die slowly, PAINFULLY. So keep yer amateur hands off him, or you're next!

200.speaker: Torturer Spike
200.text: I need him to bleed, to talk - not to die. So keep yer amateur hands off him, or you're next!

77.speaker: Torturer Spike
77.context: InternalNodeContext: Player character already talked, but chose to leave.

89.speaker: Torturer Spike
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin raises a club, ready to hit the adventurer, but then notices the player and stops.NodeContext: He's torturing an adventurer and getting sadistic pleasure from this.

42.speaker: Torturer Spike
42.text: Oh. You're back. Uh - he's all yours.
42.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank and could easily kill him if they wanted to.

84.speaker: Torturer Spike
84.text: Come to see yer friend, have ya? Come an' join 'im, if ya like.
84.context: NodeContext: First time the goblin sees the player. He doesn't know who you are, so he's making assumptions.

226.speaker: Shadowheart
226.text: Say we'll take over. His work is sloppy; he'll kill the prisoner too quickly.
226.context: NodeContext: A discreet murmur. She's got special expertise here and knows how to manipulate the situation.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: This looks interesting - let me put him through his paces.

151.speaker: Player
151.text: I wanted to join in on the fun - let me put him through his paces.

158.speaker: Torturer Spike
158.text: Or what? Ya gonna start a fight?
158.context: NodeContext: challenging. He doesn't expect you to dare hurt him.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: Orders from Minthara. You wouldn't question her, would you?

146.speaker: Torturer Spike
146.text: I - I wasn't! I didn't know! C'mon, Grush, let's go!
146.context: NodeContext: We basically accused him of treason, which could mean his head.

152.speaker: Player
152.text: Your boss sent me. He wants the prisoner intact.

116.speaker: Torturer Spike
116.text: What does 'e think we'll do? Kill 'im?

72.speaker: Torturer Spike
72.text: Gah. Whatever. I was gettin' thirsty anyway.

227.speaker: Torturer Spike
227.text: Like 'e cares. And if 'e did, 'e wouldna sent no outsider to order us around.
227.context: NodeContext: He's calling the player's bluff.

115.speaker: Torturer Spike
115.text: Get lost - 'less ya want to get whipped, too.

30.speaker: Torturer Spike
30.text: Damn it!  Dunno why Minthara hasn't killed us yet, but it ain't gonna last.
30.context: NodeContext: He's annoyed. Someone was first in finding out where the grove is, which means he failed, which could have turned out really badly, but he blames all this on the adventurer.

43.speaker: Torturer Spike
43.text: One mistake and she'll have our heads. All because this stupid dimwit didn't wanna talk.
43.context: NodeContext: He's annoyed. Someone was first in finding out where the grove is, which means he failed, which could have turned out really badly, but he blames all this on the adventurer.

203.speaker: Torturer Spike
203.text: Come to see yer friend, have ya? Come an' join 'im, if ya like.

34.speaker: Torturer Spike
34.text: You again? Wanna join 'im this time?

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Why are you still torturing him?

162.speaker: Torturer Spike
162.text: Some other git found the grove before we did. Made us look real stupid, 'e did.
162.context: NodeContext: a little sour at the memory

97.speaker: Torturer Spike
97.text: So now we're makin' sure this lad regrets not tellin' us.
97.context: NodeContext: deriving sadistic pleasure from this.

93.speaker: Torturer Spike
93.text: Poor lad. I could give ya peace, ya know.
93.context: InternalNodeContext: First encounter of player character with the goblins torturer.NodeContext: He's secretly deriving pleasure from this.

157.speaker: Torturer Spike
157.text: But nooo! Ya gotta keep silent, don'tcha? Where'd they flee to, ya stubborn RAT?

12.speaker: Liam
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin raises a club, ready to hit the adventurer, but then notices the player and stops.NodeContext: scared, he's being tortured.

90.speaker: Torturer Spike
90.text: Oh, a drow? I - I didn't see ya there.
90.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank and could easily kill him if they wanted to.

95.speaker: Torturer Spike
95.text: Please. Uh. If you wanna have a try?
95.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank and could easily kill him if they wanted to.

39.speaker: Torturer Spike
39.text: The git didn't wanna work with us. Tried t' keep the whereabouts of 'is gang a secret.
39.context: NodeContext: a little sour at the memory

109.speaker: Torturer Spike
109.text: So now we're teachin' 'im 'is place. 'Course, now that you're 'ere... we'd gladly let ya take over!
109.context: NodeContext: grovelling. He's scared of the player.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Give me your club - Minthara asked me to assist you.

50.speaker: Torturer Spike
50.text: O-of course. Uhm - but maybe not this club. It ain't worthy of you drow types.
50.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank and could easily kill him if they wanted to. They asked him to give him his club so they can torture the prisoner, but he doesn't want to give that exact club since he thinks it's too lowly for the player.

139.speaker: Torturer Spike
139.text: But there's some tongue-looseners in the fire, if you want 'em! We'll leave ya to it.
139.context: NodeContext: He just refused the player (who is much higher rank and potentially very dangerous) his own club, but is quick to suggest some other weapons he thinks are better suited.

94.speaker: Player
94.text: I don't try - I get results. Move aside.

167.speaker: Torturer Spike
167.text: O-of course! There's weapons in the fire if you want 'em. Uhm. We'll leave ya to it.
167.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank and could easily kill him if they wanted to.

103.speaker: Torturer Spike
103.text: Oh, I couldn't! N-not with an expert 'ere!
103.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank. He's aftraid they will kill him if they decide he isn't doing a good job, so he wants to flee.

8.speaker: Torturer Spike
8.text: Please. We've got some tongue-looseners in the fire if you want 'em. Uhm. We'll leave ya to it!
8.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank. He's aftraid they will kill him if they decide he isn't doing a good job, so he wants to flee.

28.speaker: Torturer Spike
28.text: Come Grush, let's go. I don't think I got the stomach for this.
28.context: NodeContext: Quetly. He's talking to his friend, and doesn't really want the player to hear.

166.speaker: Torturer Spike
166.text: 'Ere to see yer friend, have ya? Come an' join 'im, if ya like.
166.context: NodeContext: First time the goblin sees the player. He doesn't know who you are, so he's making assumptions.

60.speaker: Shadowheart
60.text: Say we'll take over. His work is sloppy; he'll kill the prisoner too quickly.
60.context: NodeContext: A discreet whisper of advice in the player's ear, trying to get a goblin torturer to leave.

209.speaker: Narrator
209.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*

59.speaker: Narrator
59.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

207.speaker: Torturer Spike
207.text: The man on it is a bit short though, don't you think 'e could be longer?

215.speaker: Player
215.text: I'll take over - unless you want the drow to learn of your failures.

9.speaker: Torturer Spike
9.text: The git snuck in 'ere with 'is mates, lookin' for some forgotten thing. Said they ran to some kinda grove.

10.speaker: Torturer Spike
10.text: 'E doesn't wanna tell us where it is, but he can't resist forever.
10.context: NodeContext: Looking forward to torturing the adventurer some more.

47.speaker: Torturer Spike
47.text: 'Course, now that you're 'ere... we'd gladly let ya take over!
47.context: NodeContext: He's talking to someone who is far above him in rank and could easily kill him if they wanted to.

6.speaker: Torturer Spike
6.text: The git tried t' keep the location of 'is little adventure friends a secret. Made us look real stupid.
6.context: NodeContext: a little sour at the memory

194.speaker: Player
194.text: Give me your club - Minthara asked me to assist you.

191.speaker: Torturer Spike
191.text: What? That drow think I can't do my job? Go on, let's see how hard you can make 'im scream.

4.speaker: Liam
4.context: NodeContext: scared - he's about to get tortured again and he's begging the player to reconsider.

92.speaker: Narrator
92.text: *Face the prisoner. Consider the implements provided. Then...*
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera should shift away here, so as not to animate the torture scene. Either to the fire or to the ground where we could see blood leaking or a leg spasming or something.

145.speaker: Player
145.text: You are about to have the best day of your miserable life!

25.speaker: Player
25.text: Would you like to start begging for mercy now, or...?

199.speaker: Liam
199.context: NodeContext: He has been tortured, but still has a little spirit. Full of hatred.

172.speaker: Player
172.text: Would you like to start begging for mercy now, or...?

182.speaker: Player
182.text: ... smash the butt of a spear into his groin.

138.speaker: Liam
138.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player smashes spear into liams groinNodeContext: There should be a sharp crack from Liam's nose breaking before he starts begging.

88.speaker: Torturer Spike
88.text: That all ya got? Bein' soft ain't gonna make 'im talk.
88.context: NodeContext: He's urging you on to use more gruesome torture tactics.

150.speaker: Player
150.text: Smash a club into his knee.

148.speaker: Narrator
148.text: *The prisoner smiles through the pain, then spits in your direction.*

105.speaker: Liam
105.context: NodeContext: He has been tortured, but still has a little spirit. Full of hatred.

56.speaker: Torturer Spike
56.text: And 'e was just about to scream. Get out. Out!

154.speaker: Torturer Spike
154.text: And 'e was just about to talk. Get out. Out!

120.speaker: Torturer Spike
120.text: Should've known you'd be soft. Get out!

102.speaker: Player
102.text: Smash a club into his knee.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Rip off a toenail with a pair of tongs.

117.speaker: Player
117.text: Crank the rack and stretch him.

134.speaker: Liam
134.text: No! P-please, why... s-stop... pl...ease... I -
134.context: CinematicNodeContext: The adventurer faints in the middle of the node.NodeContext: He's been tortured so badly he loses consciousness at the end.

66.speaker: Liam
66.text: No! P-please, we... t-to the east.
66.context: NodeContext: He's been tortured so badly he's going to lose consciousness soon.

149.speaker: Torturer Spike
149.context: NodeContext: Surprised and angry, the player suddenly pulled his weapon on the goblin to attack.

86.speaker: Torturer Spike
86.text: That all ya got? Bein' soft ain't gonna make 'im scream.

163.speaker: Player
163.text: ... press a red hot poker against his thigh.

41.speaker: Narrator
41.text: *The stench of charred flesh wafts over you.*
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player presses poker into liam

29.speaker: Liam
29.context: NodeContext: Very panicky and in pain.

186.speaker: Narrator
186.text: *You don't know why, but you are really good at this.*
186.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark urge very very happy

73.speaker: Narrator
73.text: *You never want this perfect moment to come to an end.*

106.speaker: Player
106.text: Smash a club into his knee.

20.speaker: Liam
20.text: AARGH! P-please, we... t-to the east.
20.context: NodeContext: He's been tortured so badly he's going to lose consciousness soon.

192.speaker: Liam
192.text: P-past the ruins and... the bridge. They c-covered the gate with ivy...
192.context: CinematicNodeContext: The adventurer faints in the middle of the node.NodeContext: He has a hard time talking and faints after mentioning the ivy.

124.speaker: Liam
124.text: AARGH! P-please, why... s-stop... pl...ease... I -
124.context: CinematicNodeContext: The adventurer faints in the middle of the node.

161.speaker: Torturer Spike
161.context: NodeContext: He's amused that the adventurer fainted.

98.speaker: Torturer Spike
98.text: An' you yerself, you're a nasty piece of work!

87.speaker: Torturer Spike
87.text: An' we got what we needed. Ya weren't 'alf bad. Drow'll be happy when she hears it.

126.speaker: Torturer Spike
126.text: Well, party's over. No fun kickin' a beaten dog. Let's go.
126.context: NodeContext: He's disgusted and disappointed that the adventurer fainted so soon from being tortured too much.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: This looks interesting - let me put him through his paces.

202.speaker: Torturer Spike
202.text: Bloodthirsty, ain't ya? HA. Go on then: make 'im scream.

37.speaker: Torturer Spike
37.text: Bloodthirsty, ain't ya? HA. Go on then: make 'im scream.

221.speaker: Torturer Spike
221.text: We know all about 'is secret hideout by now, so let's see what else ya can make 'im say.
221.context: NodeContext: Looking forward to what you're going to do.

212.speaker: Player
212.text: I wanted to join in on the fun - let me put him through his paces.

26.speaker: Narrator
26.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*

168.speaker: Torturer Spike
168.text: S-sorry, I didn't realise! He's all yours!
168.context: NodeContext: He's afraid. He suddenly realises he's been talking down to someone of a much higher rank.

16.speaker: Torturer Spike
16.text: Just... don't be too rough, maybe? Moonrise Towers might still want to take 'im.
16.context: NodeContext: He's afraid because he's talking to someone of a much higher rank.

114.speaker: Narrator
114.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*

133.speaker: Narrator
133.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

219.speaker: Narrator
219.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

44.speaker: Narrator
44.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

107.speaker: Narrator
107.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

190.speaker: Narrator
190.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

45.speaker: Torturer Spike
45.text: What? You think you can order me around? Get lost 'fore I beat ya to a pulp.
45.context: NodeContext: challenging. He doesn't expect you to dare hurt him.

181.speaker: Player
181.text: Go have yourselves a drink. Your boss sent me to relieve you.

69.speaker: Torturer Spike
69.text: We do all the work an' you get to finish 'im?

14.speaker: Torturer Spike
14.text: Bah. Take 'im. Won't do ya any good. 'E just... screams.

144.speaker: Torturer Spike
144.text: Should've sent 'im to Moonrise with the rest, for all the good he's been.
144.context: NodeContext: Kind of mumbling, still displeased.

129.speaker: Torturer Spike
129.text: You? I'll believe that when I see it.

196.speaker: Player
196.text: I'm a little out of practice. Another time.

201.speaker: Torturer Spike
201.text: Get out, then. Wastin' my time like that.

185.speaker: Player
185.text: I'm taking over. Your sloppy handiwork is going to kill the prisoner too quickly.

122.speaker: Torturer Spike
122.text: What, think you can do better? HA. Go on then, have at it.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: I don't put on shows for amateurs. Leave.

19.speaker: Torturer Spike
19.text: What, you shy or something? Fine! Muck it up and the drow'll have your head.

179.speaker: Player
179.text: Fine. Let me show you what real talent looks like.

225.speaker: Player
225.text: I am going to do something so awful it would scare even you to watch.

174.speaker: Torturer Spike
174.text: Oh, I'd like to see you try.

169.speaker: Torturer Spike
169.text: Think you'd fare better? Fine - prove it.

228.speaker: Player
228.text: Beating him with a club? Really? Sloppy and unoriginal. Stand aside.

51.speaker: Torturer Spike
51.text: You what? Think I'll stand 'ere while some pointy-eared bint explains my job to me?!

3.speaker: Player
3.text: No. Stand someplace else and let a professional get to work.

121.speaker: Torturer Spike
121.text: Think you're better? Fine! He's all yours - muck it up and you'll answer to the drow.

230.speaker: Torturer Spike
230.text: Heh. Maybe she'll send you back here to take his place. Then I'll show you what I can do.

141.speaker: Torturer Spike
141.text: C'mon Grush. There might still be a slurp o' ale to be had.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: Look - you haven't even gone for the fingernails. Amateur!

195.speaker: Torturer Spike
195.text: Think you can do better? Fine - prove it.

104.speaker: Torturer Spike
104.text: No. NO! Why won't 'e speak?! The drow's gonna kill me if I can't make 'im talk!

61.speaker: Torturer Spike
61.text: What d'ya think you're doin'? Ya tryin' to get into my head? I'll teach ya!
61.context: NodeContext: he's angry the player tried to read his mind.

206.speaker: Narrator
206.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

96.speaker: Torturer Spike
96.text: 'Ere to see yer friend, have ya? Come an' join 'im, if ya like.

101.speaker: Torturer Spike
101.text: I warned you, I WARNED you not to touch him. And now you'll PAY.

153.speaker: Torturer Spike
153.text: M-my drowness, if you wanted a try at torture, you only had to say so!

165.speaker: Torturer Spike
165.text: Oh. You're back. Uh - he's all yours.
165.context: InternalNodeContext: Player character already talked, but chose to leave.

180.speaker: Torturer Spike
180.text: What're you still 'ere for? I said OUT!
180.context: InternalNodeContext: This player character failed the torture.NodeContext: angry and annoyed that the player hasn't left yet after he failed the torture.
